name: CatholicPrayers(Portuguese)
0:
caret
”Alexa, open catholic prayers Portuguese”
”Alexa, ask catholic prayers Portuguese to do hail mary”
”Alexa, ask catholic prayers Portuguese to pick a prayer”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: catholic prayers portuguese
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Disclaimer: The skill content, for the prayers, is in Portuguese.

Have your Alexa say a prayer for you anytime you like. Just ask it to say a prayer from the list below or you can ask it to pick one for you by saying "pick a prayer."

You can also listen to all the prayers with two other voices: Father David and Sister Angie.

List of Prayers:

O sinal da cruz (The Sign of the Cross in Portuguese)
Pai Nosso/Oração do Senhor (Our Father/The Lord's Prayer in Portuguese)
Ave Maria (Hail Mary in Portuguese)
Glória Seja (Glory Be in Portuguese)
Credo do Apóstolo (The Apostle's Creed in Portuguese)
Salve Rainha Rainha (Hail Holy Queen in Portuguese)
Anima Christi/Alma de Cristo (in Portuguese)
Memorare (in Portuguese)
O Angelus (The Angelus in Portuguese)
Oração de São Miguel (Saint Michael Prayer in Portuguese)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
